name: C.O.P.: The Recruit
description:
C.O.P.: The Recruit is an action, shooter and racing game developed by Velez & Dubai Dev Team. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment.
You can play C.O.P.: The Recruit on Nintendo DS.
It was scored by Dan Schneider, Davide Pensato (dpstudios) and Jason Graves.
